body_html:
Hi there! I don't know if it could help but I have a ValueError: No op named BlockLSTM in defined operations. if I try to freeze model with LSTMBlockFusedCell.

import numpy as np
import tensorflow as tf

sess = tf.Session()
inp = [tf.placeholder(tf.float32, [2, 4], 'input')]
lstm_cell = tf.contrib.rnn.LSTMBlockFusedCell(10)
outputs, _ = lstm_cell(inp, dtype=tf.float32)

sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())
inputData = np.random.standard_normal(inp[0].shape).astype(np.float32)
outputData = sess.run(outputs[0], feed_dict={inp[0]: inputData})

saver = tf.train.Saver()
saver.save(sess, 'graph_with_lstm.ckpt')
tf.train.write_graph(sess.graph.as_graph_def(), '', 'graph_with_lstm.pb')

and

python freeze_graph.py \
  --input_graph graph_with_lstm.pb \
  --input_checkpoint graph_with_lstm.ckpt \
  --output_graph frozen_graph.pb \
  --output_node_names lstm_block_wrapper/BlockLSTM

import numpy as np

body:
Hi there! I don't know if it could help but I have a `ValueError: No op named BlockLSTM in defined operations.` if I try to freeze model with `LSTMBlockFusedCell`.

```python
import numpy as np
import tensorflow as tf

sess = tf.Session()
inp = [tf.placeholder(tf.float32, [2, 4], 'input')]
lstm_cell = tf.contrib.rnn.LSTMBlockFusedCell(10)
outputs, _ = lstm_cell(inp, dtype=tf.float32)

sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())
inputData = np.random.standard_normal(inp[0].shape).astype(np.float32)
outputData = sess.run(outputs[0], feed_dict={inp[0]: inputData})

saver = tf.train.Saver()
saver.save(sess, 'graph_with_lstm.ckpt')
tf.train.write_graph(sess.graph.as_graph_def(), '', 'graph_with_lstm.pb')
```
and
```shell
python freeze_graph.py \
  --input_graph graph_with_lstm.pb \
  --input_checkpoint graph_with_lstm.ckpt \
  --output_graph frozen_graph.pb \
  --output_node_names lstm_block_wrapper/BlockLSTM
```
